text: electrology advisory committee duties amend rsa to read as follows electrology advisory committee the executive director shall establish the electrology advisory committee the committee shall consist of electrologists who are licensees in the state of new hampshire the members shall be appointed for years with initial terms staggered so that the term of one member expires each year and shall hold office until successors are appointed in no event shall a member serve more than consecutive terms the committee shall conduct license competency examinations consisting of practical demonstrations determine applicant performance on the competency examination advise the executive director regarding the implementation of this chapter
